decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1600-01, 1600-02, 1600-03, 1600-04 Received: 05/02/2015 and 1600-05 and 1600-06 Received: 01/04/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the side elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side elevation walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used for purposes other than incidental to the application property and shall not be used as primary accommodation such as a living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, study or as a separate unit of accommodation. .
description: Erection of a single storey side and rear extension, a rear roof extension with roof window in front elevation and a single storey outbuilding in rear garden.
